name: Outgunned
description:
Demo of my top down  indie shoot 'em up game, with a simplistic look and chaotic gameplay.

This is not polished:

  • There is no player damage 
  • The games name on the main menu is wrong
  • The game executable is called ShootyShootGame
  • Pressing escape takes you back to the main menu

Please be honest I want to know you opinion and how I can improve.

Ill be posting devlogs and updating regularly
